enabledTitleUpdater.label: Enable Stream Title Changes
enabledTitleUpdater.tooltip: Enable this checkbox if you don't want to change your stream titles.

enabledOverlayUpdater.label: Enable Text File Changes
enabledOverlayUpdater.tooltip: Enable this checkbox if you don't want to use any text files for your Overlay.

titleInMenu.label: Title in Menu
titleInMenu.tooltip:
This text will be used when you're in the SC2 Menu.
Example: [NA] [Terran] $mymmr$mmr - New Season Hype
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

titleInGameAsPlayer.label: Title Ingame - As Player
titleInGameAsPlayer.tooltip:
This text will be used when you're in a game.
Example: [NA] $mymmr$mmr $matchup$ vs $player2$
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

titleInGameAsCaster.label: Title Ingame - As Caster
titleInGameAsCaster.tooltip:
This text will be used when you're in a game as observer.
Example: Casting $player1$ ($race1$) vs ($race2$) $player2$
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

titleInGameAsOther.label: Title Ingame - As Other (Teamgame, Coop, Arcade)
titleInGameAsOther.tooltip:
This text will be used when you're in another game like teamgames, arcade or archon.
Example: [NA] [Terran] $mymmr$mmr plays Funmaps LUL
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

titleIn1v1Replay.label: Title in Replay
titleIn1v1Replay.tooltip:
This text will be used when you're in a replay.
Example: [NA] [Terran] $mymmr$mmr - Replay Analyse
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

overlayText1.label: Generated Text File - Text1
overlayText1.tooltip:
This text will be in textfile 'SC2TitleUpdater_OverlayText1'. It changes the variables into actual live data.
Example: Playing against $player2$ ($race$)
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

overlayText2.label: Generated Text File - Text2
overlayText2.tooltip:
This text will be in textfile 'SC2TitleUpdater_OverlayText2'. It changes the variables into actual live data.
Example: Playing against $player2$ ($race$)
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

overlayText11.label: In Menu - Text file
overlayText11.tooltip:
This text will only be used when you're in the menu. Textfile: 'SC2TitleUpdater_OverlayText3'. It changes the variables into actual live data.
Example: Playing against $player2$ ($race$)
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

overlayText12.label: In Game - Text file
overlayText12.tooltip:
This text will only be used when you're in a game. Textfile: 'SC2TitleUpdater_OverlayText3'. It changes the variables into actual live data.
Example: Playing against $player2$ ($race$)
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

overlayText13.label: On Casting - Text file
overlayText13.tooltip:
This text will only be used when you're in a cast. Textfile: 'SC2TitleUpdater_OverlayText3'. It changes the variables into actual live data.
Example: Playing against $player2$ ($race$)
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

overlayText21.tooltip:
This text will only be used when you're in the menu. Textfile: 'SC2TitleUpdater_OverlayText4'. It changes the variables into actual live data.
Example: Playing against $player2$ ($race$)
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

overlayText22.label: In Game - Text file
overlayText22.tooltip:
This text will only be used when you're in a game. Textfile: 'SC2TitleUpdater_OverlayText4'. It changes the variables into actual live data.
Example: Playing against $player2$ ($race$)
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

overlayText23.label: On Casting - Text file
overlayText23.tooltip:
This text will only be used when you're in a cast. Textfile: 'SC2TitleUpdater_OverlayText4'. It changes the variables into actual live data.
Example: Playing against $player2$ ($race$)
For all parameters, check out the spreadsheet overview (shortcut file in the Folder).

bnetUsername1.label: Name of Account #1
bnetUsername1.tooltip:
Enter your StarCraft II Account name (without any BattleTag Code '#1234')
Example: Brain

bnetUsername2.label: Name of Account #2
bnetUsername2.tooltip:
Enter your StarCraft II Account name (without the BattleTag Code '#1234')
Example: Burny

bnetUsername3.label: Name of Account #3
bnetUsername3.tooltip: Enter your StarCraft II Account name (without the BattleTag Code '#1234')

bnetUsername4.label: Name of Account #4
bnetUsername4.tooltip: Enter your StarCraft II Account name (without the BattleTag Code '#1234')

bnetUsername5.label: Name of Account #5
bnetUsername5.tooltip: Enter your StarCraft II Account name (without the BattleTag Code '#1234')

oauth.label: Twitch oauth
oauth.tooltip:
Enter your OAuth here.
Link to get the OAuth: https://api.twitch.tv/kraken/oauth2/authorize?response_type=token&client_id=CLIENTID&redirect_uri=http://localhost&scope=channel_editor&scope=user_read+channel_editor

clientID.label: clientID
clientID.tooltip:
Register your new application for your Twitch account here: https://www.twitch.tv/kraken/oauth2/clients/new
Redirect URL: http://localhost

rankedFtwUrl.label: RankedFTW URL
rankedFtwUrl.tooltip:
Go to http://rankedftw.com to search your account/link.
Example: http://rankedftw.com/ladder/lotv/1v1/mmr/?team=1481253
